jam.data
Class CalibrationFunction

java.lang.Object
  jam.data.CalibrationFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinearFunction, PolynomialFunction, PolynomialOffsetFunction, SqrtEnergyFunction
public abstract class CalibrationFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function

A function that can be use to calibrate a histogram. Most often used to define energy calibrations of spectra. But could also do time of flight an rho for a magnetic spectometer.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ken Swartz

setCoeff

public void setCoeff(double[] aIn)
              throws DataException
Set the coefficients of the calibration function using the contents of the passed Array. If passed a larger than necessary array, the first elements of the array will be used.

Parameters:
aIn - array of coefficients which should be at least as large as the number of coefficients
Throws:
DataException
